price: 78 Oubliant sa propre création, il dit : « Qui redonnera vie aux os devenus poussière ? »
arabic: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلٗا وَنَسِيَ خَلۡقَهُۥۖ قَالَ مَن يُحۡيِ ٱلۡعِظَٰمَ وَهِيَ رَمِيمٞ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: waḍaraba lanā mathalan wanasiya khalqahu qāla man yuḥ'yī al-ʿiẓāma wahiya ramīmun
